Description: Wooden ointment-spoon in the form of an amphora carried on the shoulder of a female figure.
Curator's comments: Published: Un Arte per la Belleza, Padua 1984, p. 50 [62] = Un Arte per la Belleza, Lugano 1984, p. 50 [111]. Les amour d'une princesse égyptienne, Saint-Gérard 1997, p.122, 153 [86].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1984 May-Jun, Italy, Comune di Padova, Un' arte per la bellezza 1984 Oct-Dec, Switzerland, Villa Malpensata, Un' arte per la bellezza 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
